titles.title: National Sports Heritage Commission Act
To establish the National Sports Heritage Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

bill.summary: 7/27/1994--Introduced. National Sports Heritage Commission Act - Establishes the National Sports Heritage Commission to develop a fundraising plan, secure a site, and draft an operational proposal for building a National Sports Heritage Museum in Washington, D.C., as part of the Smithsonian Institution.
